features.name: App Entry
features.description: Main application component handling layout, smooth scroll (Lenis), and footer reveal logic.

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-aware visibility and links to sections.

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Hero section with parallax background, kinetic typography, and floating decorative elements.

features.name: Intro Section
features.description: Introduction section explaining the philosophy of freediving.

features.name: Courses Section
features.description: List of available freediving courses with details.

features.name: Contact Section
features.description: Contact information and possibly a form.

features.name: Footer
features.description: Footer component with links and copyright info.

features.name: Custom Cursor
features.description: Custom cursor component to replace the default browser cursor.
